hero.title: Your Journey Starts In Comfort
hero.description: Start Your Cabo Getaway With Stress-Free Private Transportation
introText.title: LOW COST RIDE WITH HIGH QUALITY SERVICE
introText.description: A Stress and Risk-Free Solution for your Airport Transfer Service. If Touring with a Group of Strangers isn't your thing, Look no Further, Cheap Transfers Cabo does not Offer shared Rides, meaning we will NOT be Picking Up or Dropping Off other Passengers along the way. The Only Stops made will be done upon your request.
ourServices.title: Our Services
ourServices.subtitle: Private transfers, guided tours, and adventure experiences made for every kind of traveler.
ourServices.service1.title: Airport & Hotel Transfers
ourServices.service1.description: Private, safe & on-time rides between Airport, Hotels, Resorts, Airbnb & Villas.
ourServices.service2.title: Group & Family Transfers
ourServices.service2.description: Spacious, comfortable vans and SUVs ideal for groups, families, and large travel parties.
ourServices.service3.title: Adventure Activities
ourServices.service3.description: Discover Cabo's desert beauty with action-packed ATV, Razor, and horseback riding adventures.
whyTrustUs.title: Why Travelers Trust Cheap Transfers Cabo
whyTrustUs.subtitle: Experience safe, private, and reliable travel backed by licensed drivers and premium comfort.
whyTrustUs.feature1.title: Private Transportation Only
whyTrustUs.feature1.description: We never offer shared or group transfers. Your ride is 100% private, direct, and tailored to your needs.
whyTrustUs.feature2.title: Professional Certified Drivers
whyTrustUs.feature2.description: Our drivers hold Federal Licenses and are certified by the Mexican Secretary of Tourism (NOM-08).
whyTrustUs.feature3.title: Well-Maintained Vehicles
whyTrustUs.feature3.description: Travel comfortably in clean, modern, air-conditioned vehicles that are regularly inspected for safety and performance.
whyTrustUs.feature4.title: Family-Owned & Trusted Since 2019
whyTrustUs.feature4.description: As a local family business, we treat every guest like part of our own family. Expect warm hospitality and exceptional service from start to finish.
aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.subtitle: A locally trusted team dedicated to stress-free airport rides and unforgettable Cabo adventures.
aboutUs.paragraph1: Welcome to Cheap Transfers Cabo — your friendly, family-run transportation service in Los Cabos. Since 2019, we've been offering reliable, private airport transfers and personalized city tours throughout Southern Baja.
aboutUs.paragraph2: Our Story & Mission Cheap Transfers Cabo began when our family realized how many travelers arrive in Los Cabos hoping for a smooth, stress-free ride — and often finding only crowded shuttles, confusing pickup lines, or shared rides with strangers. We decided there had to be a better way: one where guests ride privately, with trust, comfort, and care.
footer.description: Cheap Transfers Cabo – Reliable, comfortable, and private. Enjoy stress-free airport transfers, hotel rides, and custom tours throughout Los Cabos.

about.hero.title: Experience Comfort And Care With Cheap Transfers Cabo
about.hero.subtitle: Trusted private transfers & unforgettable Cabo experiences.
about.welcome.title: WELCOME TO CHEAP TRANSFERS CABO
about.welcome.text: Welcome to Cheap Transfers Cabo, where your comfort, safety, and travel experience always come first. We're here to make every journey in Los Cabos smooth, personal, and unforgettable—from airport pickups to guided tours and local adventures.
about.meetRodrigo.title: Meet Rodrigo – Your Trusted Guide & Licensed Driver in Los Cabos
about.meetRodrigo.p1: Rodrigo has been taking great care of guests for many years as a Certified Tour Guide at different tourist attractions in the Los Cabos area.
about.meetRodrigo.p2: Now, as a Federal Licensed Driver, he is adding airport transfers in the southernmost part of the Baja California Peninsula to his services.
about.meetRodrigo.p3: Grins, happy memories, and heartfelt reviews are just a small sample of what guests have to say about their experience.
about.meetRodrigo.p4: Don't wait—let Rodrigo handle your round-trip Airport–Hotel–Airport ride so you can relax and enjoy your time in Cabo!
about.meetRodrigo.imageAlt: Rodrigo with van in Los Cabos
about.missionVision.title: Our Mission & Vision
about.missionVision.subtitle: Guided by passion, driven by service, and dedicated to delivering memorable Cabo experiences.
about.missionVision.missionText: Our mission is to provide trusted, professional, and heartfelt transportation and tour services to every guest who visits Los Cabos. We are committed to ensuring safety, comfort, and a welcoming experience that makes travelers feel at home from the moment they arrive. Through personalized attention, reliable service, and genuine care, we aim to be the first choice for airport transfers, hotel rides, and custom tours throughout Southern Baja.
about.missionVision.visionText: Our vision is to be the most reliable and guest-loved transportation service in Los Cabos, known for excellence, personal touch, and unforgettable experiences. We strive to expand our offerings while maintaining the family values and attention to detail that set us apart. We envision a future where every traveler to Los Cabos knows they can count on Cheap Transfers Cabo for a journey that's not just a ride, but a memorable part of their Cabo adventure—ensuring happy memories and a desire to return.
about.cta.title: Your Journey Begins With Us
about.cta.text: Don't wait any longer—book your trusted transportation with Rodrigo and enjoy the perfect blend of professionalism, hospitality, and local expertise. Let Rodrigo take care of your airport transfer so you can focus on enjoying your Los Cabos adventure!
policy.hero.title: Our Privacy Commitment
policy.hero.subtitle: Learn how Cheap Transfers Cabo collects, uses, and safeguards your personal information.
policy.title: Privacy Policy
policy.intro: At Cheap Transfers Cabo, we understand the importance of protecting the privacy of our customers. This Privacy Policy outlines the types of information we collect, how it is collected, and how we use and share it.
policy.section1.title: What information do we collect?
policy.section1.text: We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, and flight details. We may also collect non-personal information such as your IP address and browser type.
policy.section2.title: How do we collect information?
policy.section2.text: We may collect information through our website, mobile app, phone calls, emails, and other communication channels when you contact us or make a reservation.
policy.section3.title: Why do we collect this information?
policy.section3.text: We collect this information to provide you with the best possible airport transfer and activity experience, including arranging your transportation or tours and communicating with you regarding your reservations and services.
activity.list.hero.text: Thrilling ATV rides, Razor adventures, horseback tours, and scenic experiences crafted for every traveler.
activity.list.about.title: YOUR ADVENTURE IN CABO STARTS HERE
activity.list.about.text: Discover the most unforgettable adventures of Los Cabos with {company}, where every activity is crafted to help you explore Baja's breathtaking landscapes—desert dunes, crystal-blue beaches, dramatic cliffs, and vibrant local culture. From thrilling ATV and Razor rides to peaceful horseback journeys and scenic day tours, we bring you closer to the heart of Cabo with comfort, safety, and a touch of authentic local hospitality.
activity.list.grid.title: Explore Our Cabo Adventures
activity.list.grid.subtitle: Exciting tours designed to make your Cabo trip unforgettable.
home.activitiesCarousel.title: The Best Things to Do in Cabo
home.activitiesCarousel.subtitle: Enjoy ATV, Razor, horseback, and guided desert activities crafted for unforgettable memories.
activity.data.laPaz.name: La Paz
activity.data.laPaz.description: Visit the beautiful capital city of Baja California Sur./ Explore the malecón, local markets, and pristine beaches. Experience authentic Mexican culture and cuisine.
activity.data.laPaz.fullDescription: Experience the charm of La Paz, the capital city of Baja California Sur. This full-day tour takes you through the vibrant malecón, bustling local markets, and pristine beaches. Discover the rich culture, taste authentic local cuisine, and enjoy the stunning views of the Sea of Cortez. Perfect for those looking to experience authentic Mexican culture away from the tourist crowds.
activity.data.atvs.name: ATV's
activity.data.atvs.description: Tackle on Trails of Migriño´s Desert, Feel the Rush,/ Witness the Baja´s Nature (Cactus and Wildlife), and the Most Beautiful Views of the Pacific Ocean.
activity.data.atvs.fullDescription: Get your adrenaline pumping on this exciting ATV adventure through Migriño's Desert. Navigate through challenging trails, witness stunning desert landscapes filled with unique cacti and wildlife, and culminate your journey with breathtaking views of the Pacific Ocean. This tour is perfect for adventure seekers looking to experience Baja's natural beauty from a thrilling perspective.
activity.data.artWalk.name: Art Walk
activity.data.artWalk.description: Walk around the historic district of San Jose del cabo while enjoying a wonderful atmosphere, full of art main garden and outstanding Art Walk.
activity.data.artWalk.fullDescription: Immerse yourself in the vibrant art scene of San Jose del Cabo's historic district. Stroll through charming streets filled with galleries, local artisans, and beautiful gardens. Experience the Thursday night Art Walk tradition where galleries open their doors, artists showcase their work, and the streets come alive with culture and creativity. Perfect for art lovers and culture enthusiasts.
activity.data.horsebackRiding.name: Horse Back Riding
activity.data.horsebackRiding.descriptio: Enjoy a very relaxing Tour on a beach, Guided, Gentle Horses. Also We offer a 2 Hour Mexican Outback Horseback Riding Vacations; This is a complete adventure.
activity.data.horsebackRiding.fullDescri: Saddle up for an unforgettable horseback riding adventure along Cabo's stunning coastline and desert trails. Whether you're a beginner or experienced rider, our professional guides will ensure a safe and memorable experience. Ride through scenic beaches, desert paths, and enjoy panoramic ocean views. This tour offers the perfect blend of adventure and natural beauty.
activity.data.razors.name: Razors
activity.data.razors.description: Tackle on Trails of Migriño's Desert, Feel the Rush, Witness the Baja's Nature and the Most Beautiful Views (Cactus and Wildlife), and the Pacific Ocean.
activity.data.todosSantos.name: Todos Santos
activity.data.todosSantos.description: Todos Santos, a charming Magical Town in Baja California Sur, blends artistic culture with natural beauty and rich history along the Pacific Coast.
activity.data.todosSantos.fullDescriptio: Todos Santos, a charming Magical Town in Baja California Sur, blends artistic culture with natural beauty and rich history along the Pacific Coast.
activity.data.cerritos.name: Cerritos
activity.data.cerritos.description: Cerritos Beach, a world-class surf spot, is known for its consistent waves and laid-back atmosphere, perfect for all skill levels along the stunning coastline.
activity.data.losCabos.name: Los Cabos
activity.data.losCabos.description: Discover Vibrant Culture And Charming Los Cabos at the Famous San Jose del Cabo, This wonderful tour will provide the opportunity to explore Cabo San Lucas.
activity.data.hiddenTowns.name: Hidden Towns
activity.data.hiddenTowns.description: This tour is a complete adventure, offering history, culture, ecology, charm, mountain, and many answer, it's one the best ways to spend a day in Cabo.
activity.data.40ft.name: 40 ft sport fishing boat
activity.data.40ft.description: This tour is a complete adventure, offering history, culture, ecology, charm, mountain, and many answer, it's one the best ways to spend a day in Cabo.
activity.data.snorkelingTour.name: Snorkeling Tour
activity.data.snorkelingTour.fullDescrip: Dive into the crystal-clear waters of the Sea of Cortez, often called the 'Aquarium of the World' by Jacques Cousteau. This snorkeling adventure takes you to the best spots to see vibrant tropical fish, playful sea lions, and beautiful coral reefs. Perfect for families and water enthusiasts, this tour includes all equipment and expert guides to ensure a safe and unforgettable underwater experience.
activity.data.desertSafari.name: Desert Safari
activity.data.desertSafari.fullDescripti: Embark on an exciting 4x4 desert safari adventure through Baja's rugged terrain. Discover hidden beaches, explore dramatic canyons, and visit traditional Mexican villages where time seems to stand still. This off-road adventure offers a unique perspective of Cabo's diverse landscapes, from desert vistas to secluded coastal areas. Experience authentic local culture and breathtaking natural beauty on this unforgettable journey.
activity.data.myDream33Footer.name: My dream 33 footer boat
activity.data.myDream33Footer.descriptio: This tour is a complete adventure, offering history, culture, ecology, charm, mountain, and many answer, it's one the best ways to spend a day in Cabo.

activity.detail.laPaz.title: La Paz / City Tour & Beach Day
activity.detail.laPaz.description: Explore culture, coast, and beauty in a full-day guided experience.
activity.detail.laPaz.welcome: WELCOME TO THE LA PAZ EXPERIENCE
activity.detail.laPaz.welcomeDes: Discover the beauty, culture, and coastline of Baja with 'Cheap Transfers Cabo' as your trusted guide. From vibrant city streets and historic landmarks to calm beaches and crystal-blue waters, this experience is crafted to give you a deeper, more meaningful connection to La Paz. Enjoy comfortable transport, expert guidance, and warm hospitality as we take you through the heart of this unforgettable destination.
activity.detail.laPaz.sub1: Key Details for Your La Paz Adventure
activity.detail.laPaz.sub1Des: Clear and simple details to help you plan your perfect La Paz trip.
activity.detail.laPaz.data.expect.points: Guided visit to the La Paz Pearl Factory with a demonstration
Walk through the historic Cathedral and cultural landmarks
Scenic stroll along the La Paz Boardwalk (Malecón)
Relaxation time at Tecolote Beach — swimming, sunbathing, and ocean views
Free time to explore shops, local food spots, or take sunset photos
Comfortable round-trip transport in an A/C van with water & beer included
Bilingual certified guide leading throughout the entire experience

activity.detail.todosSantos.title: Explore the Charm of / Todos Santos
activity.detail.todosSantos.description: Explore colorful streets, visit historic spots, and unwind on scenic beaches with Cheap Transfers Cabo.
activity.detail.todosSantos.welcomeDes: Experience the charm of this magical town with 'Cheap Transfers Cabo,' as we take you through sun-soaked beaches, vibrant streets, historic landmarks, and the creative heart of Baja. From ocean breezes to colorful galleries and unforgettable coastal views, this journey blends relaxation, exploration, and authentic local beauty into one perfect day.

activity.detail.todosSantos.sub1Des: Clear and simple details to help you plan your perfect Todos Santos.

Glass Blowing Factory - Watch skilled artisans create handmade glass pieces.

Chocolate Factory - Explore artisanal chocolate making and taste fresh creations.

activity.detail.cerritos.description: A peaceful beach escape with soft sands, perfect waves, and a calm high-vibe Baja atmosphere—brought to you by Cheap Transfers Cabo.
activity.detail.cerritos.welcome: WELCOME TO THE CERRITOS BEACH EXPERIENCE
activity.detail.cerritos.welcomeDes: Welcome to Cerritos Beach — one of Baja's most beautiful and relaxing coastal getaways! With 'Cheap Transfers Cabo,' enjoy a smooth and comfortable ride to this stunning beach where soft sand, ocean breeze, and unforgettable views create the perfect day escape. Whether you want to surf, sunbathe, or simply unwind, Cerritos promises the ideal balance of relaxation and adventure.

activity.detail.40ft.title: 40 ft Sport Fishing Boat / Full & Half Day Adventures
activity.detail.40ft.description: A premium fishing experience for up to 8 guests — with food, drinks, equipment, and licenses included.
activity.detail.40ft.welcome: WELCOME TO THE 40 FT SPORT FISHING BOAT EXPERIENCE
activity.detail.40ft.welcomeDes: Experience Cabo's world-famous fishing waters aboard a fully equipped 40 ft sport fishing boat. With professional crew, food & drinks included, and top-quality fishing gear, this adventure delivers everything you need for a successful and unforgettable day on the ocean.
activity.detail.40ft.sub1: Key Details for Your 40 ft sport fishing boat Adventure
activity.detail.40ft.sub1Des: Clear and simple details to help you plan your perfect 33 footer boat trip.
activity.detail.40ft.footerText: Ready to Explore 40 ft sport fishing boat?
Embark on a full offshore adventure aboard a comfortable 40 ft sport fishing boat, perfect for anglers of every level. Your day starts early at the Cabo San Lucas Marina, where the crew welcomes you and prepares everything for a smooth, exciting fishing trip. Enjoy a fully equipped boat with all professional fishing gear, terminal tackle, live bait, ice, and an experienced crew ready to guide you through the best fishing spots in Cabo's world-famous waters.

Relax as you cruise along the Pacific and Sea of Cortez coastline, taking in breathtaking ocean views while waiting for your catch. Drinks and a light lunch are included, keeping you refreshed throughout the journey. Whether you choose a full-day (8 hrs) or half-day (5 hrs) experience, you'll enjoy a fun, safe, and memorable fishing trip designed to help you reel in unforgettable moments on the open sea.

Enjoy a relaxing cruise, swim in crystal-clear waters, sunbathe on the deck, listen to music, and celebrate your time in Los Cabos with delicious food and unlimited drinks. Perfect for birthdays, groups, small celebrations, or just a peaceful escape — everything is prepared for you to simply enjoy.

testimonials.section.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.section.subtitle: Genuine reviews from travelers who trusted us with their Cabo journey.
testimonials.home.items.0.text: Excellent experience! Clean car, smooth ride, and very professional driver. Stress-free airport transfer. I'll definitely book again.
testimonials.home.items.1.text: Amazing private transfer! On-time, comfy, no extra stops. The best way to start a Cabo vacation. Highly recommend Cheap Transfers Cabo!
testimonials.home.items.2.text: Super smooth family transfer! Clean, cool SUV and friendly service. Perfect after a long flight. Great for groups—highly recommended!
testimonials.home.items.3.text: Best Cabo transfer yet! Professional, friendly drivers and a smooth, direct ride. Great value and comfort with Cheap Transfers Cabo.
testimonials.home.items.4.text: Seamless service from booking to pickup! Clean, modern vehicle and fast, private ride to our hotel. Will book again for sure!
testimonials.home.items.5.text: Loved our ATV tour and airport transfer! On-time, comfy, and well organized. Safe, fun, and personal—great choice for transport  and  activities!
testimonials.activity.laPaz.items.0.text: Well-organized La Paz tour with knowledgeable guide, comfortable transport, cultural highlights and relaxing beach time. Excellent value.
testimonials.activity.laPaz.items.1.text: Seamless day trip to La Paz featuring scenic views, informative commentary, and ample beach time. Professional service throughout
testimonials.activity.laPaz.items.2.text: High-quality experience combining La Paz landmarks and pristine beaches. Punctual logistics, friendly staff, and great pacing
testimonials.activity.laPaz.items.3.text: A polished, enjoyable tour with expert guidance, smooth transportation, and a perfect balance of sightseeing and relaxation.
testimonials.activity.atvs.items.0.text: Thrilling ATV desert and beach ride with expert guides, scenic views, and smooth transport. Unforgettable adventure.
testimonials.activity.atvs.items.1.text: Well-organized desert tour with quality ATVs, great scenery, and tequila tasting. I highly recommend it!
testimonials.activity.atvs.items.2.text: fantastic mix of rugged trails and coastal views, safe gear, and responsive staff made this an amazing experience.
testimonials.activity.atvs.items.3.text: Excellent ATV adventure with clear instructions, stunning landscapes, and included transport. Perfect day!
testimonials.activity.artWalk.items.0.te: An elegant cultural evening with inspiring galleries, charming historic streets, and a relaxed atmosphere. A must-do experience.
testimonials.activity.artWalk.items.1.te: Well-organized Art Walk showcasing diverse local art, welcoming galleries, and a vibrant yet refined cultural setting.
testimonials.activity.artWalk.items.2.te: A delightful way to explore San José del Cabo's art scene. Informative, engaging, and rich in local creativity.
testimonials.activity.artWalk.items.3.te: Excellent Art Walk with beautiful artwork, friendly artists, and a memorable stroll through historic downtown.
testimonials.activity.horsebackRiding.it: Exceptional Horseback Riding adventure with stunning Baja views, smooth logistics, friendly staff, and memorable moments.
Scenic horseback ride through desert trails and coastline with excellent guides, transport, and tequila tasting included.
Beautiful beach and desert horseback tour with comfortable transport, knowledgeable guides, and perfect pacing throughout.
Fantastic guided horseback experience across Baja's landscapes, great photo stops, refreshing tequila tasting, and easy pace.
Fascinating tour off the beaten path! Charming small towns, local stories, historic sites, and authentic Baja culture made it unforgettable
I loved the Hidden Towns adventure! Stunning landscapes, friendly guides, and real insight into rural Baja life — truly special and eye‑opening.
A standout cultural experience! Beautiful countryside, fascinating history, and unique towns that feel authentic and rich with character.
Incredible journey through quaint Baja villages with local insights, scenic stops, and a genuine sense of history and tradition.
testimonials.activity.razors.items.0.tex: Exhilarating Razor tour with expert guidance, stunning desert dunes and ocean views, smooth transport, and great pacing.
testimonials.activity.razors.items.1.tex: Fantastic off‑road adventure! Razor ride through rugged trails and coastal landscapes with seamless logistics throughout.
testimonials.activity.razors.items.2.tex: A delightful way to explore San José del Cabo's art scene. Informative, engaging, and rich in local creativity.
testimonials.activity.razors.items.3.tex: Excellent Art Walk with beautiful artwork, friendly artists, and a memorable stroll through historic downtown.
Captivating Todos Santos tour with scenic drives, historic sites, artisan stops, Hotel California & free exploration time
Excellent day trip to this Magical Town with cultural highlights, beautiful views, shopping & local tasting stops.
Well‑organized tour with comfortable transport, bilingual guide, gallery visits and memorable town stroll
Fantastic Todos Santos experience: artisan factory, cathedral, ocean panoramas, free time and local insights.
testimonials.activity.cerritos.items.0.t: Cerritos exceeded expectations! Beautiful beach, great waves for surfing, and a calm, welcoming atmosphere to recharge
testimonials.activity.cerritos.items.1.t: Incredible day at Cerritos! Smooth ride, stunning coastline, fun surf, and peaceful spots to just unwind and enjoy the sun.
testimonials.activity.cerritos.items.2.t: I loved exploring Cerritos Beach! Friendly guides, amazing scenery, and just the right balance of adventure and relaxation.
testimonials.activity.cerritos.items.3.t: Cerritos exceeded expectations! Beautiful beach, great waves for surfing, and a calm, welcoming atmosphere to recharge.
testimonials.activity.losCabos.items.0.t: Incredible Los Cabos tour! Beautiful coastal views, artisan stops like glassblowing, tequila tasting and historic mission visit
testimonials.activity.losCabos.items.1.t: Well‑paced full‑day adventure. I loved  iconic spots like the Cabo Arch, local crafts, tequila samples and free shopping time.
testimonials.activity.losCabos.items.2.t: Fantastic way to explore Los Cabos! Great guide, comfortable ride, culture, beaches and plenty of time to shop and explore.
testimonials.activity.losCabos.items.3.t: Memorable Los Cabos experience with scenic views, artisan demos, tequila tasting and relaxed free time at town markets.
testimonials.activity.40ft.items.0.text: Amazing fishing adventure! The 40‑ft boat was comfortable, crew was great, and we caught lots while enjoying lunch & drinks
testimonials.activity.40ft.items.1.text: Well‑organized full‑day out on the water with top gear, friendly crew, scenic views, and excellent food & drinks included.
testimonials.activity.40ft.items.2.text: Fantastic half‑day trip! Comfortable boat, professional crew, tasty snacks and drinks. Perfect mix of fishing and fun.
testimonials.activity.40ft.items.3.text: Great sport fishing experience on a 40‑ft boat. Smooth logistics, awesome crew, and plenty of fish and memories.
testimonials.activity.myDream33Footer.it: Incredible day aboard the 33‑ft cruiser! Comfortable boat, stunning Cabo views, snorkeling, paddleboarding and fun crew service.
Fantastic private boat ride! Great music, fluid pace, beautiful sights like Lover's Beach and Sea Lion Colony, and outstanding crew.
Excellent 33‑ft boat experience! Well‑stocked, safe equipment, friendly crew, and breathtaking coastal views made this special.
Memorable Cabo sea adventure with top gear, smooth ride, Bluetooth stereo, and paddleboard time — perfect for our group
